title: phones tablets and computers
extract: A tablet computer, commonly shortened to tablet, is a mobile device, typically with a mobile operating system and LCD touchscreen display processing circuitry, and a rechargeable battery in a single thin, flat package. ... Portable computers can be classified according to the presence and appearance of physical keyboards.
extract_html: A tablet computer, commonly shortened to tablet, is a mobile device, typically with a mobile operating system and LCD touchscreen display processing circuitry, and a rechargeable battery in a single thin, flat package. ... Portable computers can be classified according to the presence and appearance of physical keyboards.
